data.title: U-Hall Delivery + Salvo Take
data.description: Flush out Defenders playing towards U-Hall and take control of it with this combination of utility.

data.title: B Site Execute Drone + Salvo
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective way to execute the B Site and support your team.

data.title: Simple Hookah to Long Drone Clear
data.description: Use this pathing with your Stealth Drone, allowing you to commit resources and utility properly when contesting for B control.
